channel.title: Item on Object

item.title: Item on Object
item.dc:creator: @Phoenixx Phoenixx
item.description:
@Phoenixx wrote:

				else if(useItemID == 1038 && atObjectID == 1738) //Phat color1
				{
				sendMessage("You change the color of your "+GetItemName(1038)+" to yellow.")
				deleteItem(1038,getItemSlot(1038), 1);
				addItem(1040, 1);
				}
				else if(useItemID == 1040 && atObjectID == 1738) //Phat color2
				{
				sendMessage("You change the color of your "+GetItemName(1040)+" to green.")
				deleteItem(1040,getItemSlot(1040), 1);
				addItem(1044, 1);
				}
				else if(useItemID == 1044 && atObjectID == 1738) //Phat color3
				{
				sendMessage("You change the color of your "+GetItemName(1044)+" to blue.")
				deleteItem(1044,getItemSlot(1044), 1);
				addItem(1042, 1);
				}
				else if(useItemID == 1042 && atObjectID == 1738) //Phat color4
				{
				sendMessage("You change the color of your "+GetItemName(1042)+" to purple.")
				deleteItem(1042,getItemSlot(1042), 1);
				addItem(1046, 1);
				}
				else if(useItemID == 1046 && atObjectID == 1738) //Phat color5
				{
				sendMessage("You change the color of your "+GetItemName(1046)+" to white.")
				deleteItem(1046,getItemSlot(1046), 1);
				addItem(1048, 1);
				}
				else if(useItemID == 1048 && atObjectID == 1738) //Phat color6
				{
				sendMessage("You change the color of your "+GetItemName(1048)+" to red.")
				deleteItem(1048,getItemSlot(1048), 1);
				addItem(1038, 1);
				}

Ok here is a simple little code I made I was wondering if you guys could help me out a bit.

Errors received.

client.java:13957: ';' expected deleteItem(1038,getItemSlot(1038), 1); ^ client.java:13963: ';' expected deleteItem(1040,getItemSlot(1040), 1); ^ client.java:13969: ';' expected deleteItem(1044,getItemSlot(1044), 1); ^ client.java:13975: ';' expected deleteItem(1042,getItemSlot(1042), 1); ^ client.java:13981: ';' expected deleteItem(1046,getItemSlot(1046), 1); ^ client.java:13987: ';' expected deleteItem(1048,getItemSlot(1048), 1); ^ 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Any idea?

Read full topic
